<title level="1" right="Spell 7" pfs="Standard">
[Prismatic Armor](/Spells.aspx?ID=973)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=640" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 122 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 willing creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You wrap the target in armor made of multicolored light. It functions as [_chromatic armor_](/Spells.aspx?ID=881) that is all colors (granting resistance 5 to [acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3), [electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=75), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), and [sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=147)). An attacker that critically fails on its saving throw against the spell is [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=1) rather than [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7).

---
**Heightened (9th)** The resistances increase to 10 each.
name: Prismatic Armor
